update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: Data collection interval, measured in seconds.

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL of the Prometheus metrics endpoint.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The timeout in seconds for the HTTP request.

not_follow_redirects.title: Not follow redirects
not_follow_redirects.description: If set, the client will not follow HTTP redirects automatically.

expected_prefix.title: Expected prefix
expected_prefix.description: If an endpoint does not return at least one metric with the specified prefix, the data is not processed.

label_prefix.title: Label prefix
label_prefix.description: An optional prefix that will be added to all labels of all charts. If set, the label names will be automatically formatted as `prefix_name` (the prefix followed by an underscore and the original name).

app.title: Application
app.description: If set, this value will be used in the chart context as 'prometheus.{app}.{metric_name}'.

vnode.title: Vnode
vnode.description: Associates this data collection job with a [Virtual Node](https://learn.netdata.cloud/docs/netdata-agent/configuration/organize-systems-metrics-and-alerts#virtual-nodes).

selector.title: Selectors
selector.description: Configuration for selecting and filtering a set of time series using Prometheus selectors. If left empty, no filtering is applied.

allow.title: Allow
allow.description: Allow time series that match any of the specified [selectors](https://github.com/netdata/netdata/tree/master/src/go/plugin/go.d/pkg/prometheus/selector#readme).

deny.title: Deny
deny.description: Deny time series that match any of the specified [selectors](https://github.com/netdata/netdata/tree/master/src/go/plugin/go.d/pkg/prometheus/selector#readme).

max_time_series.title: Time series limit
max_time_series.description: If an endpoint returns more time series than this limit, the data is not processed. Set to 0 for no limit.

max_time_series_per_metric.title: Time series per metric limit
max_time_series_per_metric.description: Metrics with more time series than this limit are skipped. Set to 0 for no limit.

fallback_type.title: Untyped metrics fallback
fallback_type.description: Process Untyped metrics as Counter or Gauge instead of ignoring them.

gauge.title: As Gauge
gauge.description: Untyped metrics matching any [pattern](https://golang.org/pkg/path/filepath/#Match) will be processed as Gauge.

Counter.title: As Counter
Counter.description: Untyped metrics matching any [pattern](https://golang.org/pkg/path/filepath/#Match) will be processed as Counter.

bearer_token_file.title: Bearer token file
bearer_token_file.description: The path to the file with Bearer token.

proxy_url.title: Proxy URL
proxy_url.description: The URL of the proxy server.

headers.title: Headers
headers.description: Additional HTTP headers to include in the request.

tls_skip_verify.title: Skip TLS verification
tls_skip_verify.description: If set, TLS certificate verification will be skipped.

tls_ca.title: TLS CA
tls_ca.description: The path to the CA certificate file for TLS verification.

tls_cert.title: TLS certificate
tls_cert.description: The path to the client certificate file for TLS authentication.

tls_key.title: TLS key
tls_key.description: The path to the client key file for TLS authentication.

vnode.ui:placeholder: To use this option, first create a Virtual Node and then reference its name here.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).

selector.ui:help: The logic is as follows: `(allow1 OR allow2) AND !(deny1 OR deny2)`.
